name: MANSA
description:
Mansa is a combination of an auto chess turn-based system with RPG elements you play as Mansa the strategic digital consciousness dragged from your present into the future.

You must place the right kind of data warriors to gain an advantage on the battlefield

Combining a set of three similar pieces will  a combination of the right pieces will give you a better advantage 

Claim the portions of the digital landscape, captured by the dawn breaker virus save the last of humanity.  Mansa is still in the alpha state and in active development. Please consider giving us your feedback to help us improve the game. Any idea or suggestion is always welcome!


Features

  • Turn-based system.
  • Character upgrade through combinations.
  • Different classes for different strategies i.e (ranged, melee, and mage classes).
  • Boss fight.



    Created by Tobe Ezeogu

    Music from www.pond5.com
